clue1.value: Newspaper: “The opening of the new plant has finally taken place. The inhabitants of our city have long awaited the opening of a new factory and to their joy it was built in record time. Unfortunately, the opening day was overshadowed by scandalous events - the man who conducted the opening was the son of the tycoon Schiller, who built the plant. Unfortunately, his son has not the best reputation and on this significant day he also distinguished himself. At the opening ceremony, the Magnate's son was making a speech, but to great disappointment it was interrupted by none other than the man making it! Suddenly, to the surprise of all present, the Magnate's son, Joseph Schiller, accused one of those present of making an attempt on his life. Joseph himself claimed that the man was a member of a notorious radical terrorist organization. Unfortunately, poor Prince Joseph was unaware that the government had officially announced the complete destruction of this organization.”
